snippet: The attacks in Paris that killed 129 people were not the work of Muslims, many say, adding that they see it as their responsibility to defend their religion.
lead_paragraph: The attacks in Paris that killed 129 people were not the work of Muslims, many say, adding that they see it as their responsibility to defend their religion.

headline.main: Muslims Defend Islam From Being Hijacked by ISIS

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
